column4: Hey guys. This is kind-of relevant to all of you, because I seed a lot of Ubuntu images on my server.

So there's a bit of a problem I need solving. So there are 354 torrents in my uTorrent client and 466 files in the Downloads folder. Is there a way to easily identify which files are not *in* the uTorrent client without going through them manually?
Right, well you should try to goto a uTorrent support channel and not a Ubuntu support? ;)
Well, you guys are smart. You might figure something out, I'm sure.
